subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: J.J. Barea and Al-Farouq Aminu recorded their first career postseason double-doubles to go with 31 points from Monta Ellis, and Dallas won Game 4.
snippet: J.J. Barea and Al-Farouq Aminu recorded their first career postseason double-doubles to go with 31 points from Monta Ellis, and Dallas won Game 4.
